person.persName: W. C. Root (First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment.)

body.p: Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on July 27, 1861. Promoted from Sergeant to 2nd Lieutenant, August 18, 1862; to 1st Lieutenant, December 25, 1863.
